trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: Gera automaticamente os comandos de tabela única que são utilizados para reconciliar as alterações efetuadas a um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> com a origem de dados associado.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> associated with the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>não gerar automaticamente as instruções SQL necessárias para reconciliar as alterações efetuadas a um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>associada com a origem de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an OdbcCommandBuilder object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, pode criar um objeto de OdbcCommandBuilder gera instruções SQL para atualizações de tabela única definindo a <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OdbcCommandBuilder then generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set.
trans-unit.target: O OdbcCommandBuilder, em seguida, gera quaisquer instruções SQL adicionais que não definido.

trans-unit.source: The relationship between an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and its corresponding OdbcCommandBuilder is always one-to-one.
trans-unit.target: A relação entre um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>e respetivos OdbcCommandBuilder correspondente é sempre um para um.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To create this correspondence, you set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> property of the OdbcCommandBuilder object.
trans-unit.target: Para criar esta correspondência de e-mail, defina o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>propriedade do objeto OdbcCommandBuilder.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: This causes the OdbcCommandBuilder to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that affect the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que o OdbcCommandBuilder registar-se como um serviço de escuta, o que produz o resultado de <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos que afetam o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the OdbcCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar instruções INSERT, UPDATE ou DELETE, utiliza o OdbcCommandBuilder o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade para obter um conjunto de metadados necessário.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the value of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should then call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Se alterar o valor de <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>depois dos metadados de obtenção, tal como após a primeira atualização, em seguida, deve chamar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>método para atualizar os metadados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the SELECT statement assigned to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property uses aliased column names, the resulting INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements may be inaccurate or fail.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se a instrução SELECT atribuído para o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade utiliza um alias os nomes das colunas, o resultante INSERT, UPDATE, e instruções de eliminação podem estar incorreta ou falhar.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying ODBC driver cannot provide the appropriate base column name for the alias column name (using the SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME value of `SQLColAttribute`), the alias name could be used in the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlador ODBC subjacente não é possível fornecer o nome da coluna de base adequado para o nome de coluna de alias (utilizando o valor SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME do `SQLColAttribute`), o nome de alias pode ser utilizado em instruções INSERT, UPDATE e DELETE geradas.

trans-unit.source: For example, the Microsoft ODBC Driver for Oracle returns the alias name as the base column name.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o controlador ODBC do Microsoft Oracle devolve o nome de alias como o nome de coluna base.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements would cause errors.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, as instruções INSERT, UPDATE e DELETE geradas poderia causar erros.

trans-unit.source: The OdbcCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O OdbcCommandBuilder também utiliza o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>e <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Transaction%2A>Propriedades referenciada pelo <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the value of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property itself is changed.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador deve chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se um ou mais destas propriedades forem modificados, ou se o valor da <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>apresentado pela própria propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>Propriedades manter os respetivos valores anteriores.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the OdbcCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, o OdbcCommandBuilder é desassociar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>, e os comandos gerados já não são utilizados.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The base constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: O construtor base inicializa todos os campos para os respetivos valores predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe associada com <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>regista-se automaticamente como um serviço de escuta para <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>especificadas nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>associada a este <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>é libertado.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para associar a este <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref> object for which this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref> object will generate SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para o qual este <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"> </xref> objeto irá gerar instruções SQL.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>regista-se automaticamente como um serviço de escuta para <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>especificadas nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>associada a este <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>é libertado.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto que está associado a este <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações de parâmetro do procedimento armazenado especificado no <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> e preenche o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*>coleção de especificado <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters substitui quaisquer informações de parâmetro existente para <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters necessita de uma chamada adicional para a origem de dados para obter as informações.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações do parâmetro são conhecidas seguinte com antecedência, é mais eficiente para preencher a coleção de parâmetros ao definir explicitamente as informações.

trans-unit.source: You can only use DeriveParameters with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Só pode utilizar DeriveParameters com procedimentos armazenados.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use DeriveParameters to populate the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível utilizar DeriveParameters para preencher o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection>com instruções Transact-SQL arbitrários, como uma instrução SELECT parametrizada.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> referenciar o procedimento armazenado a partir da qual as informações do parâmetro são derivada.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros derivados são adicionados para o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*>coleção do <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The underlying ODBC driver does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, or the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref> specified was not <xref uid="langword_csharp_CommandType.StoredProcedure" name="CommandType.StoredProcedure" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O controlador ODBC subjacente não suporta a devolver informações de parâmetro de procedimento armazenado ou o texto do comando não é um nome de procedimento armazenado válida, ou o <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref> especificado não era <xref uid="langword_csharp_CommandType.StoredProcedure" name="CommandType.StoredProcedure" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar eliminações na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o método de GetDeleteCommand para fins de resolução de problemas ou informativas porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar GetDeleteCommand como a base de um comando de modificação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar GetDeleteCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, explicitamente tem de chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetDeleteCommand will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetDeleteCommand irá utilizar as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar as eliminações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar eliminações na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>método para resolução de problemas ou informativa fins porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>como base de um comando de modificação.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modificar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, explicitamente tem de chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>irá utilizar as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento predefinido, ao gerar nomes de parâmetros, consiste em utilizar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>para gerar os parâmetros com base nos nomes de colunas em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isto é concluída com êxito apenas se forem satisfeitas as seguintes condições: - <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e o comprimento é igual ou maior do que o nome do parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome do parâmetro gerado cumpre os critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>está especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de colunas, se for possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar as eliminações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar inserções na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o método de GetInsertCommand para fins de resolução de problemas ou informativas porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar GetInsertCommand como a base de um comando de modificação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar GetInsertCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, explicitamente tem de chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetInsertCommand still will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetInsertCommand ainda irá utilizar as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> necessário para efetuar inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar inserções na origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>método para resolução de problemas ou informativa fins porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>como base de um comando de modificação.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modificar o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, explicitamente tem de chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>irá utilizar as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento predefinido, ao gerar nomes de parâmetros, consiste em utilizar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>para gerar os parâmetros com base nos nomes de colunas em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isto é concluída com êxito apenas se forem satisfeitas as seguintes condições: - <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e o comprimento é igual ou maior do que o nome do parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome do parâmetro gerado cumpre os critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>está especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de colunas, se for possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref> necessário para efetuar inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador unquoted no caso de catálogo correto, devolve o correto entre aspas formulário esse identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isto inclui corretamente escape qualquer aspas no identificador de incorporados.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador unquoted original.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão delimitada por aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: Incorporados aspas dentro do identificador estão corretamente caráter de escape correto.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador unquoted no caso de catálogo correto, devolve o correto entre aspas formulário esse identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isto inclui corretamente escape qualquer aspas no identificador de incorporados.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador unquoted original.

trans-unit.source: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the ODBC driver, calling SQLGetInfo(SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR).
trans-unit.target: Quando uma ligação é passada, faz com que o wrapper de gerido aproveitar o caráter plica SQLGetInfo(SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR) ao chamar o controlador ODBC.

trans-unit.source: When no connection is passed, the string is quoted using values from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix*> and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando não é passada nenhuma ligação, a cadeia está entre aspas utilizando os valores <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão delimitada por aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: Incorporados aspas dentro do identificador estão corretamente caráter de escape correto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador delimitado por aspas, devolve o formato correto unquoted esse identificador, incluindo corretamente unescaping qualquer aspas incorporadas no identificador de.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador com as aspas incorporadas removidas.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly unescaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador unquoted, com aspas incorporados unescaped corretamente.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador delimitado por aspas, devolve o formato correto unquoted esse identificador, incluindo corretamente unescaping qualquer aspas incorporadas no identificador de.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador com as aspas incorporadas removidas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly unescaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador unquoted, com aspas incorporados unescaped corretamente.
